content: Kyle is a 3rd year undergraduate student at the University of Maryland, College Park where he studies Computer Science and Mathematics.
He aims to utilize his passion for coding and math to develop software solutions that are both accessible and powerful. In his off-time,
Kyle practices chinese yo-yo, wushu, and dance through various clubs at the University of Maryland such as CP Diabolo, TerpWushu, and Tianyi.

autocmd FileType c setlocal shiftwidth=4 tabstop=4
autocmd FileType css setlocal shiftwidth=2 tabstop=2
